PPI::Token::Number::Octal(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation PPI::Token::Number::Octal(3)

NAME

PPI::Token::Number::Octal - Token class for a binary number

SYNOPSIS

  $n = 0777;      # octal integer

INHERITANCE

  PPI::Token::Number::Octal
  isa PPI::Token::Number
      isa PPI::Token
          isa PPI::Element

DESCRIPTION

The "PPI::Token::Number::Octal" class is used for tokens that represent base-8 numbers.

METHODS

base

Returns the base for the number: 8.

literal

Return the numeric value of this token.

SUPPORT

See the support section in the main module.
